what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Myotonia ?,"The National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke supports and conducts an extensive research program on neuromuscular disorders. The goals of this research are to learn more about these disorders and to find ways to treat, prevent, and cure them.",NINDS,Myotonia
